GAMEPLAY UPDATE

GAMEPLAY PATCH: PART ONE

GENERAL UPDATES

MAP UPDATES
MAP REWORKED
To see every change, it is recommended to load-up the game.
SLIDE LEFT FOR THE NEW VERSION
RADIANT SAFELANE
RADIANT PRIMARY JUNGLE
RADIANT ROSHAN PIT
DIRE SAFELANE
DIRE PRIMARY JUNGLE
DIRE ROSHAN PIT
JUNGLE UPDATES
RADIANT AURA
NEW
New Aura. The Radiant Ancient imbues every allied hero under its control with +3 Health Regeneration and +1 Mana Regeneration while traversing their native woods in-between the lanes.
DIRE AURA
NEW
New Aura. The Dire Ancient imbues every allied hero under its control with +8 Attack Damage and +2 Armor while traversing their own dead woods in-between the lanes.
MAP AURAS
REMOVED
Well Wishes, Mighty Mines, Stalwart Statues, and Skeleton Strength map auras have been removed.
MISCELLANEOUS
Neutral Camps were relocated, and new paths have been added to discover while navigating inside the forests.
ECONOMY UPDATES
PASSIVE GOLD
Base GPM increased from 90 to 100. This amount no longer increases as the game progresses.
RELIABLE & UNRELIABLE GOLD
The following events now provide reliable gold:
Roshan Death
Hero Death
Structure Destruction
Alchemist: Greevil's Greed
Bounty Hunter: Track
Hand of Midas: Transmute
The following events now provide unreliable gold:
Bounty Runes
Passive GPM
SHOP UPDATES
SIDE SHOPS
RETURNING
Side Shops have returned to their original location near the side lanes. However, their inventory is rather limited, only selling Items that cost less than 450 Gold:
Quelling Blade
Ring of Protection
Orb of Venom
Ring of Regen
Sage's Mask
Magic Stick
Wind Lace
Stout Shield
Vitality Orb
Sorcerer's Orb
Ring of Rejuvenation
Arcane Bracelet
SECRET SHOPS
Moved the following artifact from the Secret Shop to the Main Shop:
Talisman of Evasion
Secret Shops now sell the recipe for every Item in the game.
Rune UPDATES
RUNES
Bounty Runes:
REWORKED
Bounty Runes now provide 75 Gold and Experience to the hero who picks them up. The gold and experience reward is increased by 15 every two minutes.
Water Runes:
REWORKED
Water Runes no longer spawn naturally. They can only be acquired through channeling Lotus Pools.
Shield Rune:
REMOVED
Shield Rune has been removed from the game.
Wisdom Rune:
REMOVED
Wisdom Rune has been removed from the game.
Aghanim's Shard UPDATES
AGHANIM'S SHARD
REWORKED
Aghanim's Shard is no longer a purchasable item from the shop; instead, it now drops from killing Roshan as a reward.
Aghanim's Shard no longer grants a new ability nor improves an existing one; instead, it can now be used to replace a component when building Aghanim's Scepter.
CREEP UPDATES
NEUTRAL CREEP SCALING
REWORKED
Neutral Creeps now gain a level every 4 minutes. When they level up, they gain +4 Attack Damage and +0.8 Armor. Their levels can be viewed at the same location as hero levels.
When a Neutral Creep is dominated, it instead levels up every time its owner levels up.
ANCIENT CREEPS
Ancient Creeps now have 100% Magic Resistance.
Small Ancient Creep Levels increased from 3 to 8.
Big Ancient Creep Levels increased from 6 to 10.
MEGA CREEPS
Mega Creeps now spawn with +4 Attack Damage and +0.8 Armor per consecutive wave.
FLAGBEARER CREEPS
REWORKED
Flagbearer Creeps now only spawn on the mid-lane and grant 200% of the experience of a melee creep when killed.
Inspirational Aura now grants +15% Movement Speed in a 1200-radius to allied units instead of +3 Health Regeneration.
miscellaneous
Lane Creeps no longer gain +15 Movement Speed during nighttime.
ROSHAN UPDATES
ROSHAN ATTRIBUTES
Roshan now has Debuff Immunity.
Roshan Base Health increased from 6000 to 9000
Roshan Base Health Regeneration increased from 20 to 30
ROSHAN REWARDS
REWORKED
Killing Roshan now upgrades the next three waves to Mega Creep waves with catapults.
Roshan now drops the same rewards on both sides:
First Death: Aegis of the Immortal + Aghanim's Shard
Second Death: Aegis of the Immortal + Slice of Cheese🛈Explained in detail on the Item Updates page. + 2X Aghanim's Shards
Third Death: Aegis of the Immortal + Cheese + 3X Aghanim's Shards
Fourth Death: Aegis of the Immortal + Block of Cheese + Aghanim's Tome of Mastery🛈Explained in detail on the Item Updates page.
miscellaneous
Roshan no longer uses Twin Gates to travel between his pits. He now uses an underground cave system, which is inaccessible by heroes, to travel to the other pit. How he dug this cave system and gets to the other side so quickly will remain a trade secret.
Roshan Respawn Interval decreased from 8-11 minutes to 8-10 minutes.
HERO CLASS UPDATES
TALENT SYSTEM
REMOVED
Talents have been removed from the game. Explained in detail in the "Graveyard" section on the Main Page.
HERO CLASS PERKS
NEW
Heroes now gain class specific benefits depending on their primary attribute.
Strength heroes now gain +0.4% Slow Resistance per Strength.
Agility heroes now gain +0.07% Movement Speed per Agility.
Intelligence heroes now gain +0.1% Magic Resistance per Intelligence.
INNATE ABILITIES
NEW
Every Hero in the game now has an innate ability.
These passive and active abilities differ from being a useful tool early on to being a game-changing late-game ability to abuse. A few of these innate abilities will be familiar, for example, Invoker's Invoke or Earth Spirit's Stone Remnants; however, others, like Chaotic Luck or Black Grimoire, will probably not be.
CREEP-HEROES
REWORKED
Creep-Heroes are now even more similar to heroes. They are now treated by every ability in the game as heroes, and are capable of leveling up. They level-up when their owner levels up and gain 4 bonus attack damage and 0.8 bonus armor with each level.
Heroes and summons affected by this: Brewmaster (Elemental Spirits), Lone Druid (Spirit Bear🛈Spirit Bear already had a similar scaling rule.), Visage (Familiars), and Warlock (Chaotic Golem).
miscellaneous
Heroes no longer gain +30 Movement Speed during nighttime.
Heroes no longer get a free Teleport Scroll upon death.
Melee Heroes no longer have Innate Damage Block.
Heroes Maximum Level decreased from 30 to 25
HERO KILL UPDATES
HERO KILL GOLD FORMULA
REWORKED
OLD HeroBounty = 125 + (DeadHeroLevel x 8) + StreakGold
NEW HeroBounty = 2 x [ 2 x (DeadHeroLevel + 0.01 x DeadHeroNetworth)] + StreakGold
AOE ASSIST GOLD FORMULA
REWORKED
OLD AssistGold = (30 + VictimNetWorth x 0.038) x NetWorthDifferenceFactor / NumberOfHeroes
NEW AssistGold = [(HeroBounty - StreakGold) / 2] / NumberOfHeroes
FIRST BLOOD
REWORKED
First Blood no longer awards the killer with +135 Gold.
First Blood now imbues the killer with a permanent bloodlust, causing that particular hero to gain +10 Attack Damage for the entirety of the game.
STRUCTURE UPDATES
MOMENTUM SURGE
NEW
New Buff. Lane Creeps now gain this buff upon the destruction of an enemy tower. Grants +10% Movement Speed and +40 Attack Speed for 10 seconds.
GLYPH OF FORTIFICATION
REWORKED
No longer grants Multishot ability during the duration.
No longer grants invincibility to allied creeps during the duration.
Now grants 100% Damage Reduction to allied structures for 20 seconds. The damage reduction gradually decreases over the duration.
TWIN GATES
REWORKED
Twin Gates were moved to the location where the Tormentors used to be.
Twin Gates do not require to be channeled anymore; the teleporting is instant; however, they place a dispellable debuff on the teleported units that silences and mutes them for 4 seconds. Twin Gates cannot be used while the user is silenced, preventing instant teleports back.
LOTUS POOLS
REWORKED
Lotus Pools were moved to the center of the primary jungles.
Lotus Pools now spawn a Healing Lotus every 2 minutes on the ground around the structure, ready to be picked up.
Lotus Pools can now be channeled to instantly restore 50 health and 100 mana. Once channeled, they dry up and go on cooldown for 3 minutes. While it is on cooldown, the Healing Lotus spawning is delayed and temporarily stopped. If the channeler has a Bottle, then it will be filled with a Water Rune.
TORMENTORS
REMOVED
Tormentors have been removed from the game. Explained in detail in the "Graveyard" section on the Main Page.
OUTPOSTS
REMOVED
Outposts have been removed from the game. Explained in detail in the "Graveyard" section on the Main Page.
WATCHERS
REMOVED
Watchers have been removed from the game. Explained in detail in the "Graveyard" section on the Main Page.
TOWER PROTECTION AURA
No longer grants +1/3 Health Regeneration.
DAMAGE TYPE UPDATES
DOMINATED DAMAGE
NEW
New Damage Type. Creeps set under control permanently by Helm of The Dominator or a summon hero like Chen now gain this damage type. Units with this damage type deal 200% damage to heroes, 100% to creeps and 50% to structures.
PURE DAMAGE
Pure Damage now pierces Magic Immunity.🛈Due to the Debuff Immunity reworks.
PURE DAMAGE
Reflected Damage now pierces Magic Immunity.🛈Due to the Debuff Immunity reworks.
miscellaneous
Runty Damage Penalty against Fortified Armor Type increased 30% to 50%.
Pierce Damage Penalty against Fortified Armor Type increased from 65% to 75%.
Pierce Damage Penalty against Hero Armor Type decreased from 50% to 25%.
Pierce Damage Bonus against Basic Armor Type increased from 50% to 100%.
Siege Damage Bonus against Fortified Armor Type increased from 150% to 200%.
Siege Damage Penalty against Hero Armor Type increased from 0% to 25%.
Siege Damage Penalty against Basic Armor Type increased from 0% to 50%.
ATTRIBUTE UPDATES
GENERAL ATTRIBUTE PERKS
Attributes now have a primary attribute bonus. Heroes gain 20% more from the properties of their primary attribute.🛈Hero Class Perks are not increased.
STRENGTH
Health per strength decreased from +22 to +18
AGILITY
Armor per agility decreased from +0.167 to +0.143
INTELLIGENCE
No longer grants +0.1% Magic Resistance per intelligence.
Mana per intelligence decreased from +12 to +9
UNIVERSAL
REMOVED
Universal Primary Attribute has been removed from the game.
MECHANIC UPDATES
MAGIC AMPLIFICATION
REWORKED
Replaced Spell Amplification with Magic Amplification. Magic Amplification increases magic damage rather than spell damage.
MAGIC LIFESTEAL
REWORKED
Replaced Spell Lifesteal with Magic Lifesteal. Magic Lifesteal restores health proportional to the magic damage dealt rather than spell damage.
LIFESTEAL
REWORKED
Replaced Lifesteal creep penalty with a range penalty. Lifesteal now restores less health with distance, up to a maximum of 1200-range.
HEX
REWORKED
Separated Hex into two versions:
Basic Hex. Transforms a unit into a lesser unit, applying Silence, Mute, Disarm, and a 50% Movement Slow while active.
Strong Hex. Transforms a unit into a lesser unit, applying Silence, Mute, Disarm, Break, and a 75% Movement Slow while active.
ROOT
REWORKED
Separated Roots into two types:
Basic Root. Prevents the target from moving, casting mobility abilities, and grants True Sight while active.
Strong Root. Prevents the target from moving, attacking, casting abilities, and grants True Sight while active.
Forced Movement now removes all properties of Roots.🛈Examples of forced movement: Force (Force Staff), Dispose (Marci), Meat Hook (Pudge).
miscellaneous
Evading attacks is no longer possible while disabled.🛈Evasion is deactivated while disabled. Miss Chance/Blind effects still work.
Certain Channeling abilities now allow movement during the channel process.
Items in the backpack are no longer visible to enemy players.
Experience Acquisition Range decreased from 1500 to 1200
Status Resistance has been renamed to Debuff Resistance.
DEBUFF IMMUNITY UPDATES
DEBUFF IMMUNITY
REWORKED
Debuff Immunity no longer grants Magic Resistance, Pure Damage Immunity, and Reflected Damage Immunity.
Debuff Immunity is now the same mechanic as Debuff Resistance/Status Resistance. It is equal to 100% Debuff Resistance. When an ability is cast on you while you are affected by Debuff Immunity, the ability will still deal damage, but the debuff simply expires without ever affecting you.
Abilities can no longer piece Debuff Immunity.
ABILITY UPDATES
DISABLE TYPE
NEW
New Ability Property. Abilities now have a new property, replacing the arbitrary rules regarding Debuff Immunity piercing: Disable Type. Every disable in the game - stun, root, banish, or taunt - is now either a Soft Disable or a Hard Disable.
Soft Disable: These abilities work how previous disables worked; affected by status effect manipulating sources; whether this meant increasing or decreasing the disable duration.
Hard Disable: These abilities have an absolute duration that cannot be increased or decreased; they are unaffected by status effect manipulating sources.
